## About

I'm local to Howell. Everything I make is homemade with the best ingredients I can find. I have a culinary degree from the NY Restaurant School. I'm a mom of 2 - 21 & 18.

## Where to Find My Products

- Calgo Gardens Farmers Markets
- Ola State Park Bakery and General Store
